# Issue #035: Configuration Governance and Versioning

**Phase:** Phase 4 - Scale & Governance  
**Weeks:** 24-25  
**Component:** Backend + Tools  
**Estimated Effort:** 6 days  
**Priority:** Medium  
**Labels:** phase-4, backend, tooling, governance

## Description
Implement configuration governance including version control, validation pipeline, linting rules, testing framework, deployment pipeline, and rollback mechanism.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Configuration version control (Git-based)
- [ ] Configuration validation pipeline
- [ ] Configuration linting rules
- [ ] Configuration testing framework
- [ ] Configuration deployment pipeline
- [ ] Rollback mechanism
- [ ] Configuration diff viewer
- [ ] Approval workflow
- [ ] Configuration audit trail
- [ ] Environment promotion (dev → staging → prod)
